channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: ‘I Bought This Before Elon Went Crazy’ Bumper Stickers Won’t Work on the New $60,000 Cybertruck
item.description: Tesla introduced its cheapest Cybertruck model this week amid struggling sales.

item.title: NASA’s First Crewed Mission to the Moon in 50 Years Has Never Looked Closer
item.description: With a wet dress rehearsal successfully concluded, the Artemis 2 mission could launch in a matter of weeks.

item.title: Supreme Court Rules Most of Donald Trump’s Tariffs Are Illegal
item.description: In a 6-3 ruling, justices upended the Trump administration’s signature economic policy, potentially putting the US government on the hook for at least $175 billion in tariff refunds.

item.title: Toy Story 5 takes aim at creepy AI toys: ‘I’m always listening’
item.description: Addictive, AI-enabled tablets are taking over, and also, Woody is balding in the new Toy Story movie, out June 19.

item.title: Google Chrome reveals a host of new productivity tools - including a much-wanted split screen boost, and improved PDF annotation
item.description: Google has added Split View, PDF annotation and save-to-Drive features to Chrome 145 to make your work even more efficient.

item.title: « C’est tellement efficace » : on a testé Grok dans deux Tesla, l’IA capable du meilleur comme du pire
item.description: Grok, l'intelligence artificielle de xAI, arrive sur les Tesla via une mise à jour à distance. Nous avons pu l'essayer sur deux voitures différentes, de quoi percevoir les qualités et les limites de cet assistant... un brin particulier.

item.title: Supreme Court Shocks World by Correctly Declaring Trump’s Global Tariffs Unconstitutional
item.description: The landmark 6-3 ruling knocks down a load-bearing beam of Trump's economic agenda.

item.title: Oh God, Vibe Coding on Smart Glasses Is a Thing Now
item.description: Two 2026 buzzwords for the price of one.

item.title: Prop bet
item.description: Substack has updated its partnership with betting platform Polymarket, "introducing native tools that make it easier to share, discuss, and debate prediction market data directly on Substack." Additionally, Polymarket will effectively pay "a cohort of creators," including Matt Yglesias, to use its data though the newsletter platform's pilot sponsorships program. This is just the latest […]...

item.title: Coup de tonnerre : la Cour suprême invalide les droits de douane de Trump
item.description: C'est un énorme coup de tonnerre au-dessus de la Maison Blanche. La Cour suprême américaine a en effet décidé à une large majorité que Donald Trump ne pouvait pas décider seul d'imposer des droits de douane au monde entier. L'arrêt a des conséquences politiques et économiques majeures, aux États-Unis comme à l’international.

item.title: Anker’s Prime Power Bank can quickly charge three devices, and it’s down to $80
item.description: Juggling multiple chargers for your gadgets while you’re commuting, working from a cafe, or traveling can get heavy (and pricey!) fast, which is why today’s deal on the Anker Prime Power Bank (20K, 200W) is worth checking out. It can quickly charge three devices at once — including laptops — and it’s down to just […]

item.title: Apple : le code source de macOS 26.3 confirme 3 nouveaux produits pour la keynote, voici ce qu’on sait
item.description: Alors qu'Apple vient tout juste de confirmer un événement spécial pour le 4 mars 2026, une fuite dévoile déjà une partie du programme. Au menu : le très attendu MacBook abordable sous puce d'iPhone et des écrans Studio Display flambant neufs.

item.title: Fake Proton VPN extensions slip into Chrome Web Store — here’s how to stay safe
item.description: Proton has warned that fake VPN extensions using its branding appeared in the Chrome Web Store, with takedowns taking weeks. Here’s what happened, the risks for users, and how to protect yourself.

item.title: ISS Experiment Reveals the Secret Ingredient for Asteroid Mining: Microbes
item.description: An experiment on board the ISS tested the use of microorganisms to mine asteroids in the microgravity environment.

item.title: Capcom asks players not to share Resident Evil Requiem spoilers ahead of launch after early copies leaked — 'We really want everyone to enjoy the game's story'
item.description: Capcom has asked players not to leak Resident Evil Requiem spoilers ahead of the game's official launch next week after physical copies of the game leaked.

item.title: Meta’s metaverse leaves virtual reality
item.description: Meta said it's shifting focus for Horizon Worlds to be "almost exclusively mobile" and that it will separate its Quest VR platform from the virtual world.

item.title: ‘Starfleet Academy’ Could Be Heading to a Big Queer Love Triangle
item.description: One star thinks so, at least.

item.title: I’ve spent months with the Drop + Epos PC38X wired gaming headset, and its audiophile audio quality and performance are hard to beat
item.description: The Drop + Epos PC38X could almost be considered old now, but it’s still great. If you can find it in stock, then it’s an easy recommendation for those looking for a wired gaming headset that can make your games’ audio sing.

item.title: DJI’s Osmo Pocket 4 Is Going to Be a Certified Hit if This Leak Is Real
item.description: So long as DJI can skirt the U.S. ban, we may get a vlogging camera built for shooting at night.

item.title: Lucid Motors slashes 12% of its workforce as it seeks profitability
item.description: The layoffs affect hundreds of full-time workers in the US, according to an internal memo obtained by TechCrunch.

item.title: Le plan ingénieux d’Octopus Energy pour baisser votre facture grâce à un détail de votre compteur Linky
item.description: Le fournisseur Octopus Energy dévoile une option inédite en France. Elle utilise le Linky pour allumer ou éteindre le ballon d'eau chaude de manière dynamique, pour réduire la facture d'électricité.

item.title: Bon plan PS5 : le lecteur de disques pour Slim et Pro revient en promotion
item.description: Grâce à JoyBuy qui offre une légère promotion de 3,3 % sur le lecteur de disques de la PS5, il est possible de faire évoluer votre PlayStation 5 ou votre PlayStation 5 Pro à prix réduit.

item.title: Trump’s global tariffs were just struck down by the Supreme Court. Here’s what that means
item.description: The decision on Friday centers on tariffs imposed under an emergency powers law, including the sweeping “reciprocal” tariffs. The Supreme Court has struck down President Donald Trump’s far-reaching global tariffs, handing him a significant loss on an issue crucial to his economic agenda.

item.title: AI’s promise to indie filmmakers: faster, cheaper, lonelier
item.description: AI expands access to filmmaking for resource-constrained creators. But as efficiency becomes the industry’s north star, creativity risks being overwhelmed by a deluge of low-effort, AI-generated content.

item.title: Prepare for pitch battle: Startup Battlefield 200 nominations are open
item.description: Nominations for TechCrunch Startup Battlefield 200 are open. Pitch at Disrupt 2026 in October in front of top VCs and the full TechCrunch audience. Nominate your startup or for one that's deserving.

item.title: Samsung’s Galaxy Z TriFold restock sold out in minutes
item.description: Samsung unleashed a new batch of Galaxy Z TriFold units after selling out initial stock of the behemoth foldable that turns into a 10-inch tablet. It took less than ten minutes to sell through today's supply, which either speaks to the phone's surprising popularity or, rather, just how few of them the company is making. […]

item.title: How technology is reinventing global payments
item.description: AI has the potential to unleash money flows by automating and routing payments instantly and with lower fees.

item.title: Snag this self-cleaning robot vacuum and mop combo for under $350
item.description: As of Feb. 20, you can get the eufy Omni C20 robot vacuum-mop for just $349.98 at Amazon, down from $599.99.

item.title: Tamron’s new dongle lets you wirelessly control your lens from your phone
item.description: Tamron has announced a new USB-C dongle that wirelessly connects compatible lenses to mobile devices and laptops so they can be customized and controlled remotely. It works with 16 of the company's lenses to start. The $50 Tamron-Link dongle is available now, and while its Bluetooth range is limited to just over 16-feet, it's one […]

item.title: Meta and YouTube are now facing a legal reckoning that harkens back to cases against big tobacco
item.description: Experts say the landmark cases in L.A. and New Mexico are reminiscent of trials against tobacco and opioid markets. For years, social media companies have disputed allegations that they harm children’s mental health through deliberate design choices that addict kids to their platforms and fail to protect them from sexual predators and dangerous content. Now, these tech giants are getting a chance to make their case in courtrooms around the country, including before a jury for the first time.Some of the biggest players from Meta to TikTok are facing federal and state trials that seek to hold th...

item.title: 5 ways to build a brand consumers find irresistible
item.description: It’s not just about being visible or different to win in the long run.

item.title: Claire’s went from tween mall icon to bankrupt — twice?
item.description: Behind its glittery facade, Claire’s is a financial mess. The tween retail icon behind millions of ear piercings and Y2K accessories filed for bankruptcy in August 2025, closing hundreds of stores and selling its North American business for just $104 million. So how does a brand with $1.4 billion in global sales end up with […] Behind its glittery facade, Claire’s is a financial mess. The tween retail icon behind millions of ear piercings and Y2K accessories filed for bankruptcy in August 2025, closing hundreds of stores and selling its North American business for just $104 million. So how doe...

item.title: FBI warns ATM "jackpotting" attacks are soaring - here's what you need to know
item.description: Physically breaking into an ATM is getting more popular and the FBI is sounding the alarm.

item.title: Couleurs, prix, design : on fait le point sur le futur MacBook pas cher
item.description: Le 4 mars, Apple organise un événement spécial qui devrait être consacré à des produits un peu meilleur marché que d'habitude chez le constructeur : il devrait en effet être question de l'iPhone 17e et surtout, de ce fameux MacBook d'entrée de gamme. En attendant la grande révélation, quelques rumeurs permettent d'imaginer à quoi ressemblera le portable....

item.title: Test du Samsung Galaxy Book 6 Ultra : la vision est accomplie
item.description: Pour cette année 2026, Samsung sort du chapeau son Galaxy Book 6 version Ultra. Panther Lake a-t-il enfin de quoi réaliser la vision du constructeur ? Réponse dans notre test.

item.title: Ubisoft lays off 40 staff working on Splinter Cell remake, says game remains in development
item.description: It has already been a depressingly busy year for layoffs at Ubisoft, and the French publisher’s Toronto studio is the latest workforce to be hit. Around 40 jobs have been cut at the studio, which is one of Ubisoft’s largest and has previously worked on games including Watch Dogs: Legion and Far Cry 6. "This decision was not taken lightly and does not in any way reflect the talent, dedication, or contributions of the individuals affected," Ubisoft said in a statement to Mobile Syrup, which first reported the new layoffs. "Our priority now is to support them through this transition with comprehe...

item.title: Peak XV raises $1.3B, doubles down on AI as global VC rivalry in India heats up
item.description: Peak XV says most of its new capital will target India as the firm prioritizes AI, fintech and cross-border bets while navigating recent partner departures.

item.title: Microsoft France supprime une centaine de postes à Issy-les-Moulineaux
item.description: Microsoft a annoncé son intention de fermer son centre d'ingénierie d'Issy-les-Moulineaux, menaçant une centaine de postes. Le géant américain souhaite centraliser ses forces dans des hubs internationaux, au détriment de son antenne française.

item.title: How to watch Mainz 05 vs. Hamburger SV online for free
item.description: How to watch Bundesliga for free. Watch Mainz 05 vs. Hamburger SV in the Bundesliga for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Transférer directement une eSIM d’iPhone vers un smartphone Android est possible, mais seulement chez cet opérateur
item.description: iOS 26.3 ajoute entre autres la possibilité de transférer une eSIM d'un iPhone vers un mobile Android. Mais la liste des opérateurs qui jouent le jeu en France est bien maigre pour le moment.

item.title: Watch the First ‘Witch Hat Atelier’ Trailer and Get Ready for Your New Anime Obsession
item.description: We finally have a great first look at how Kamome Shirahama's fantastic magical manga is being brought to animated life.

item.title: Fender Mix Headphones Review: So Much More Than a Branding Gimmick
item.description: It surprised me, but Fender's first pair of wireless headphones has some solid features that are actually worth paying for.

item.title: I review laptops for The Verge, ask me anything

item.title: The wellness wild west’s latest skincare fad is salmon sperm
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest gizmos and potions that swear they're going to change your life. Opt in for Optimizer here. While scrolling through my TikTok feed, I often find myself thinking of Elizabeth Báthory. Legend has it that […]

item.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 Super Early Bird rates end in 1 week
item.description: The lowest ticket rates of the year for TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ends next Friday, February 27. Save up to $680 on your pass. Register now before prices increase.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Saturday, February 21 (game #1489)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (February 20)
item.description: From The Night Agent's return to Brendan Fraser's latest movie, here's what's worth watching at home this weekend.

item.title: ExpressVPN unveils 'industry-first hybrid' VPN browser extension — and takes on the Metaverse with new Meta Quest app
item.description: ExpressVPN just dropped a massive update for VR fans and browser power-users. Here’s what the new 'hybrid' VPN extension actually does.
